title: The Case When I Created A Secret Society of Darkness Because I Reincarnated As A Villain, But For Some Reason, It Became My Harem - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Seinen
tags: Abandoned Children   Adventurers   Aristocracy   Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Dwarfs   Elves   Engagement   Fantasy World   Forced into a Relationship   Game Elements   Godly Powers   Hated Protagonist   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Misunderstandings   Monsters   Netori   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Personality Changes   Polygamy   Pregnancy   Previous Life Talent   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in a Game World   Royalty   Secret Organizations   Secretive Protagonist   S*ave Harem   S*aves   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Tsundere   Underestimated Protagonist   Yandere
author: Crosis
description:
Why did this happen? ＼(^o^)／

One morning, as I woke up, I recalled the memories of my past life as if it was natural, just like the forthcoming of dusk and dawn. 

 

The world I live in now is very similar to those in fantasy adventure games I played in my previous life, and when I found out that I was actually a villainous character doomed by the protagonist, I tried to live a modest but vigorous life so that I could avoid my fated end. Yet, somehow, I ended up having the strongest female slave unit, which could probably dominate the world without me lifting a finger.>
